tool_description: English speaking medical facilities throughout the world
title: English speaking medical facilities

api_list.name: Facilities
Countries
api_list.description: Lists countries in the data base
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://english-speaking-medical-facilities.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-speaking-medical-facilities.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
